issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add DataFusion logos
issue.body: ***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11860](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11860). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.* ### Original Issue Description: Issue automatically created from Pull Request [9630](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9630) I don't think this needs a JIRA? These are the DataFusion logos that I had created before the project was donated to Apache Arrow. They weren't part of the source code repo so didn't get donated at the time.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11860?focusedCommentId=17295521) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
